title: Mind Travellers
description: Can the mind leave the body and travel through space and time?YES, say those whose true experiences are included in this explosive new book!The Enigma of Astral ProjectionA workman, buried alive in a construction trench, arranges his own rescue by sending his image to call for help...A German soldier gathers advance information from the French by mentally transporting himself behind enemy lines...A pedestrian sees himself being hit by a car and later recounts complete details of the accident and the treatment administered to his unconscious body...Brad Steiger's The Mind Travellers is a casebook on the enigma of astral projection. It considers the facts not only in the light of personal testimony, but also from the most recent laboratory experiments utilizing hypnosis and drugs.
author: Brad Steiger
